subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ike Davis and Rod Barajas — two Mets not on the roster last season — each homered twice to lead the team to a 6-4 victory against the Giants at Citi Field.
snippet: Ike Davis and Rod Barajas — two Mets not on the roster last season — each homered twice to lead the team to a 6-4 victory against the Giants at Citi Field.
